trans-unit.source: Defines the base class for classes in the <see cref="N:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar" /> namespace that correspond to the elements in an SRGS grammar.
trans-unit.target: 定義<see cref="N:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar" />命名空間中的類別（對應至 SRGS 文法中的項目）的基底類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsElement> class is the base class for the following classes, which correspond to elements defined in the [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761):
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsElement>類別是針對下列類別，其對應至項目中定義的基底類別[語音辨識文法規格 (SRGS) 1.0 版](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761):

trans-unit.source: Two additional classes inherit from <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsElement> and represent the text contained within the classes listed above (SrgsText), and recognition matching modes (SrgsSubset):
trans-unit.target: 兩個其他類別繼承自<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsElement>代表 (SrgsText)，上面所列的類別中包含的文字和辨識比對模式 (SrgsSubset):

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsElement" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsElement" /> 類別的新執行個體。
